title: Happy Birthday, Hanamaru-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Happy birthday, Hanamaru-chan! Here’s a present from me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you zura~! Can Maru open it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Of course.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’s really big.... What may it be? Let’s see.... Ah, a basket bag! It’s so cute zura~. Maru will use it with my one-piece dress♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Take a look inside that basket bag.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh? Inside? Okay.... Ah, there’s a small case! Is Maru supposed to open this too....? Could it be....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I do wonder~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ah, aaah! They’re earphones zura! Cordless too! It’s the future zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu. You like reading books, don’t you, Hanamaru-chan? Those earphones have noise cancellation. I hope they’ll be useful to you when you read.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Amazing, this is amazing! Thank you, Karin-san! Maru will treasure your gifts zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
